data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Béarez, Philippe, Motomura, Hiroyuki (2009): Description of a new scorpionfish (Scorpaenoidei, Sebastolobinae) from the tropical eastern Pacific. Zootaxa 2277: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275262
